mini_brewery.name: Mini Brewery
mini_brewery.desc: Portable factory for liquor. Most planets buy liquor for a good price.

mini_smelter.name: Mini Smelter
mini_smelter.desc: Portable factory for metals. Metals are used for building basically everything.

mini_microfab.name: Mini Microfab
mini_microfab.desc: Portable factory for microchips. Microchips are used for advanced items.

mini_refinery.name: Mini Refinery
mini_refinery.desc: Portable factory for chemicals. Chemicals are used for making advanced items.

plastics_factory.name: Plastics Factory
plastics_factory.desc: Large factory for plastics. Plastics are used for making advanced items.

optics_factory.name: Optics Factory
optics_factory.desc: Large factory for optics. Optics are used for making lasers and fusion cores.

brewery.name: Brewery
brewery.desc: Large factory for liquor. Most planets buy liquor for a good price.

smelter.name: Smelter
smelter.desc: Large factory for metals. Metals are used for building basically everything.

microfab.name: Microfab
microfab.desc: Large factory for microchips. Microchips are used for advanced items.

refinery.name: Refinery
refinery.desc: Large factory for chemicals. Chemicals are used for making advanced items.

robot_factory.name: Robot Factory
robot_factory.desc: Large factory for robots. Robots are a very high-tier material and will eventually be consumable too.(WIP)

medicine_lab.name: Medicine Lab
medicine_lab.desc: Large factory for medicine. Medicine is useless, because we're living in the future and people don't die of preventable causes. Just sell it at Megrez Prime or something.

antimatter_maker.name: Antimatter Maker
antimatter_maker.desc: Large factory for antimatter. Sell antimatter to your local military-industrial complex!

handgun_fab.name: Handgun Fab
handgun_fab.desc: Large factory for handguns. Why do you need that?

warp_fuel_factory.name: Warp Fuel Factory
warp_fuel_factory.desc: Large factory for warp fuel. Warp fuel is used for nothing.

industrial_smelter.name: Industrial Smelter
industrial_smelter.desc: Gigantic smelter for making metals. You won't need another.

industrial_brewery.name: Industrial Brewery
industrial_brewery.desc: Gigantic brewery for making liquor. You won't need another.
